content: I think I'll start with Coursera's "Data Analysis" course by University of Colorado Boulder. I've heard good things about Coursera and it seems like a great way to get a solid foundation in data analysis. Also, I've been noticing that a lot of my coworkers are taking online courses to upskill, and it's making me realize how important it is to stay current in my field. I'm not getting any younger, and I want to make sure I'm competitive in the job market.
